trans-unit.source: Create Hadoop, HBase, Storm, or Spark clusters on Linux in HDInsight using the HDInsight .NET SDK | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Create Hadoop, HBase, Storm, or Spark clusters on Linux in HDInsight using the HDInsight .NET SDK | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create Hadoop, HBase, Storm, or Spark clusters on Linux for HDInsight using the HDInsight .NET SDK.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create Hadoop, HBase, Storm, or Spark clusters on Linux for HDInsight using the HDInsight .NET SDK.

trans-unit.source: Create Linux-based clusters in HDInsight using the .NET SDK
trans-unit.target: Create Linux-based clusters in HDInsight using the .NET SDK

trans-unit.source: The HDInsight .NET SDK provides .NET client libraries that make it easier to work with HDInsight from a .NET Framework application.
trans-unit.target: The HDInsight .NET SDK provides .NET client libraries that make it easier to work with HDInsight from a .NET Framework application.

trans-unit.source: This document demonstrates how to create a Linux-based HDInsight cluster using the .NET SDK.
trans-unit.target: This document demonstrates how to create a Linux-based HDInsight cluster using the .NET SDK.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] The steps in this document create a cluster with one worker node.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] The steps in this document create a cluster with one worker node.

trans-unit.source: If you plan on more than 32 worker nodes, either at cluster creation or by scaling the cluster after creation, then you must select a head node size with at least 8 cores and 14GB ram.
trans-unit.target: If you plan on more than 32 worker nodes, either at cluster creation or by scaling the cluster after creation, then you must select a head node size with at least 8 cores and 14GB ram.

trans-unit.source: For more information on node sizes and associated costs, see [HDInsight pricing](https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/hdinsight/).
trans-unit.target: For more information on node sizes and associated costs, see [HDInsight pricing](https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/hdinsight/).

trans-unit.source: Create a new Visual Studio project with the following settings
trans-unit.target: Create a new Visual Studio project with the following settings

trans-unit.source: From the **Tools** menu, click **Nuget Package Manager**, and then click **Package Manager Console**.
trans-unit.target: From the **Tools** menu, click **Nuget Package Manager**, and then click **Package Manager Console**.

trans-unit.source: Run the following command in the console to install the packages:
trans-unit.target: Run the following command in the console to install the packages:

trans-unit.source: These commands add .NET libraries and references to them to the current Visual Studio project.
trans-unit.target: These commands add .NET libraries and references to them to the current Visual Studio project.

trans-unit.source: From Solution Explorer, double-click **Program.cs** to open it, paste the following code, and provide values for the variables:
trans-unit.target: From Solution Explorer, double-click **Program.cs** to open it, paste the following code, and provide values for the variables:

trans-unit.source: A console window should open and display the status of the application.
trans-unit.target: A console window should open and display the status of the application.

trans-unit.source: You will also be prompted to enter your Azure account credentials.
trans-unit.target: You will also be prompted to enter your Azure account credentials.

trans-unit.source: It can take several minutes to create an HDInsight cluster, normally around 15.
trans-unit.target: It can take several minutes to create an HDInsight cluster, normally around 15.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Customize HDInsight clusters using Bootstrap](hdinsight-hadoop-customize-cluster-bootstrap).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Customize HDInsight clusters using Bootstrap](hdinsight-hadoop-customize-cluster-bootstrap).

trans-unit.source: Modify the sample in [Create clusters](#create-clusters) to configure a Hive setting:
trans-unit.target: Modify the sample in [Create clusters](#create-clusters) to configure a Hive setting:

trans-unit.source: For more inforamtion, see [Customize Linux-based HDInsight clusters using Script Action](hdinsight-hadoop-customize-cluster-linux.md).
trans-unit.target: For more inforamtion, see [Customize Linux-based HDInsight clusters using Script Action](hdinsight-hadoop-customize-cluster-linux.md).

trans-unit.source: Modify the sample in [Create clusters](#create-clusters) to call a Script Action to install R:
trans-unit.target: Modify the sample in [Create clusters](#create-clusters) to call a Script Action to install R:

trans-unit.source: Now that you have successfully created an HDInsight cluster, use the following to learn how to work with your cluster.
trans-unit.target: Now that you have successfully created an HDInsight cluster, use the following to learn how to work with your cluster.
